member.summary: Start method for Collision. Happens once on Start.

member.summary: Update method for Collision Checks if pacman is colliding with anything.

member.summary: PowerPillCollision happens when pacman eats a power pill

member.summary: FoodCount happens when pacman eats a food

member.summary: Method that happens once on finish.
